title: 1887 N28 Allen Ginter Caruthers SGC 6 For Sale

posts.post_title: 1887 N28 Allen Ginter Caruthers SGC 6 For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have an extra 1887 N28 Allen & Ginter of Caruthers.  It’s a beauty, SGC 6!  SOLD.  Just email me at [url]martyesullivan@yahoo.com[/url] if you’re interested.

I’m always looking for signed T206 cards, and signed 1933 Goudey cards. If you have any, please message me!

My best,
Marty S.

Check out my signed 1933 Goudey collection on Instagram @signed1933goudey
